titleNullable: Emotional First Aid Dataset for Chinese
subtitleNullable: ❤️Emotional First Aid Dataset, 心理咨询问答语料库
descriptionNullable:
### Context

Open Data for Chinese psychological counseling is rare. We build this corpus to accelerate the adaption of AI Technologies in psychological area, especially for Chinese, there are a huge number of people who need help, not just because we team are mostly Chinese.

### Content

We use spiders to crawl several big web sites that provide online chat rooms or BBS for people who has potential mental disease, they submit questions, others like  psychological counselors provide opinions, comforts. Some experts encourage the consultant to establish confidience or share knowledges. In return, the consultant would talk more and feel better. First, we collect the chats. Secondly, we label the data with multi-labels, for both title and chats in the post or chat room.

The data is sanitized and no personal information is associated. 

To get detail of the data structure and records size, check out https://github.com/chatopera/efaqa-corpus-zh .


### Acknowledgements

As psychology is hard, we work very hard to make this corpus accurate for every label we annotate, but we maybe wrong. So, just use this corpus for Research, but not for business. We also publish it with GPL 3.0 License.


### Inspiration

We have a large number of data that haven't been labeled, please contact us if you have interests. Read our CALL FOR VOLUNTEERS!

https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/116508541
